name: Dragonheart
text: Your familiarity with dragonkind makes you less susceptible to their abilities.
benefit: You gain a +1 bonus on all saving throws against auras, breath weapons, spell-like abilities, spells, supernatural abilities, and other special attacks of creatures with the dragon type.
text_zh: 你对龙类的熟悉使你更易抵抗他们的能力。
benefit_zh: 你在对抗龙类生物的灵光效果，喷吐武器，类法术能力，法术，超自然能力和其他特殊能力时，在所有豁免上获得+1加值。
